commit message: Added note about updating ADK version in Balanduino firmware
Fix lint warning and update Gradle
Use GraphView on Maven central instead of local copy

Update Gradle and all dependencies

Also start using Gradle wrapper
Simplify the was connected icon is updated
Don't log device name as error
Set progress can simply be called after OnSeekBarChangeListener is set
Now able to upload firmware to different Balanduino revisions
Updated instruction to build, as I am now using the Gradle wrapper
